entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @Mike_Pence @VP @VP makes CEOs of industries heavily affected by #COVID19 take off their masks during their meeting for optics and photo ops even though he himself has been around the infection. I thought america was a free country? People can wear masks if they want without mvp endangering them
